name: Rando-Gun
description:
In this game, you have to clear an obstacle course by destroying all of the targets. What's the catch? Your gun's properties fully randomize every time you run out of bullets.

There are three types of barrels:

  • Shooter: Shoots bullets straight on.
  • Spreader: Shoots three bullets in a row.
  • Launcher: Shoots bullets in an arch, affected by gravity.

And two types of ammunition:

  • Billiard: Ricochets around the level.
  • Ghost: Travels through walls.

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. The theme was Roll of the Dice.
